content.title: Community Pillows and Blankets (TV Episode 2012)
content.stars: Joel McHale, Gillian Jacobs, Danny Pudi
content.description: The United Forts of Pillowtown, headed by Abed, is at war with the Legit Republic of Blanketsburg, ruled by Troy. Annie sets up a hospital zone to treat casualties on both sides. Britta ...
